A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Gonna keep this spoiler free\, but here is my opinion on The Last Jedi.

The movie is essentially just one scene that drags on for 2 and a half hours with unnecessary side stories and highly predictable outcomes. They try so hard to be different that much of what was interesting about TFA is now rendered useless and evidently we should feel dumb for being upset about that.

Wasted and unexplained character plots from previous installments and what they did to Luke is unforgivable to me as a fan.

I want to love this movie\, but I just can't.....
